ncrsdatagroup.abcd:ProjectTitle: Collecting trip to the Azores in 1979

ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: AZO.029: AZO.29: Azores, Faial, S coast, Horta, W-side of Porto Pim; 38°31'N 28°38'W; sandy bottom with rocks, stones and boulders; shore-collecting; 8.x.1979
CANCAP-V, Sta. 5.K06: Azores, S coast of Pico, Lajes harbour; large rockflat, large rockflat, sandy bay with boulders and stones; 38°24'N 28°15'W; shore-collecting; 4.vi.1981
CANCAP-IV, Sta. 4.K25: Selvagens archipelago, Salvagem Grande, Enseada da fonta das Galinhas; rocky shore in bay, 0-6 m; 30°08'N 15°52'W; snorkeling; 1/6.vi.1980
CANCAP-IV, Sta. 4.K01: Canary Islands, N coast of Gran Canaria, Las Palmas, Playa de las Canteras; 28°09'N 15°26'W; rocky areas, sandy lagoon, depth 0-5 m; ; 28.iv.1980
5.122: CANCAP-V, Sta. 5.122: Azores, N of Sao Jorge; 38°39'N 27°54'W; depth 400 m, muddy mixed sand with shell gravel; van Veen grab; 4.vi.1981

3.128: CANCAP-III, Sta. 3.128: off Mauritania; 18°57'N 16°30'W; depth 30 m, muddy sand with some shells and worm tubes; van Veen grab; 29.x.1978
